file_content.text: Travel to the infected world is strictly prohibited. While the travel ban is in effect, any ships believed to originate from the world will be fired upon.
I understand we now have Addalar Hyland on the line. Hyland is the CEO of Galactic Solutions Industries, and founder of The Hyland Organization for Rakghoul Neutralization, or THORN.
Yes, good. Citizens of the Empire, I implore you to listen to what I have to say about this ghastly plague.
There is no escaping it. There is no cure. The only known way to stop its spread--the only way to save yourself--is to stay away.
Now, that said, THORN is looking for brave and gifted individuals to help. But make no mistake: it's akin to granting yourself the death sentence--
Thank you for your pointed insight, Addalar Hyland. As the man stated, don't be a fool--remain in full quarantine from the rakghoul plague. For the Empire....
